Analyze the following text: A slave device used in a data transmitting and receiving system in which a plurality of slave devices 102103501502 are connected to a common medium 105 and perform communication with a master device 101 wherein when desiring to enter a communication system a slave device 104503 transmits an association request message as a message for requesting to allow an entrance to the master device 101 in a period in which the slave device 104503 performs transmission and the master device 101 performsreception wherein the slave device 104503 which is allowed to enter receives from the master device 101 a schedule relating to a period for a target of medium access control in which the master device 101 can perform scheduling of a polling period for requesting a period for transmitting user data to the master device 101 from the slave device 104503 and a user data transmission period for transmitting the user data to the master device 101 from the slave device 104503 and the master device 101 can change allocation of the polling period wherein the slave device 104503 waits for the polling period in the period for a target of medium access control in accordance with the schedule transmits a message for requesting the user data transmission period to the master device 101 and then transmits the data in the user data transmission period that is scheduled by the master device 101 as a result of the polling operation and wherein the communication between the master device 101 and the slave device 104503 is performed using a periodic frame including both a period during which there is a possibility that a data transmitted from the slave device 104503 competes and a period during which an occupancy for each slave 104503 is recognized the association request message of the slave device 104503 for requesting to allow the entrance is transmitted in the period during which there is the possibility of competition and the requesting of the period for transmitting the user data is not performed in the period during which there is the possibility of competition but performed in the period during which the occupancy is recognized.
